resources.string:
Please allow the recording application to check that you pronounce correctly or wrongly. 
Press "ALLOW RECORDING" and AGREE / ALLOW 

Or 
1. Under Settings, select Permissions 
2. Turn on the Microphone

Please allow the recording application to perform this function. 
Press "ALLOW RECORDING" and AGREE / ALLOW 
 
Or 
1. Under Settings, select Permissions 
2. Turn on the Microphone
We need your permission to record, in order to perform this function
